page.title: 06BEAUMONT LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Opened in June 1985 the building covers one acre and is set in 55 acres of park land and cost Â£2.5,000,000. The Pool Hall has four pools, a wave machine and a 39 metre flume ride with a dip and two tunnels.In the Sports Hall there are facilities for basketball volleyball, badminton, squash, martial arts, snooker, boxing, darts, gymnastics, netball, hockey, fitness training, cricket nets, and five aside football. A creche is available and there is a bar, a cafe and a meeting room. Outdoor sports areas include 14 grassed pitches, a cricket wicket, a 9 hole golf course, 4 synthetic floodlit ball courts, a bowls green and an area for exhibitions and fairs.
